name: unbudgeted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Unbudgeted costs are not included in a budget (= a plan of how much money you will spend on something): The Department of Finance estimates the agency will spend another £37 million in unbudgeted costs this year. Hurricane damage accounted for about £710 million in unbudgeted expenses.
More examplesFewer examplesWe had to commit unbudgeted and unplanned resources to enable us to be ready for the changes at such short notice. The areas affected by flooding this summer are facing unbudgeted cleanup costs.The staff is clocking up a lot of unbudgeted overtime.
